divs: Sighting Detailswalked outside to have a cigarette bout 12:45am sat on steps gazing up staring at the stars, then seen what i thought at first was plane or a helicopter but this wasnt blinking the green or red lights like most planes i see (being that airport only 5-7 miles away from where i am living)this looked like a star moving across the sky, thought to myself if it was space station. the direction this travel was from northwest toward the southeast. watched it travel from one bunch of stars to another , stopped for bout 15 seconds or so at the second bunch of stars and then started moving BACKWARDS toward where it started. right before it got to the point where i seen it start the light went poof and disappeared. finished my cigarette waiting to see if it appear back again but never did
trends: There has been one other sighting in clinton
There were no other sightings in clinton on or around May 31st 2011
